reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and sexy, with a vibrant deep red color and perfect fit. The dress is comfortable and flatters various body types, with one customer noting it hides the tummy area well. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising its nice texture while others find it cheap. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some reporting it runs very small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and flattering dress!
items.body: This is such a great dress! I wore it for a wedding and got a ton of compliments! The color is beautiful. I am usually between a Medium and Large for tops and dresses so I bought both sizes and went with the Medium. I am 5’4” 160lbs for reference! I am 8 months post partum and this was really comfortable and flattering considering I have some extra weight in my midsection. I felt super confident in this. The large fit nice too but I didn’t want a looser fit, I wanted something a little more curvy. So if you want looser fit, I’d order the large. As far as quality goes. I don’t think it will hold up for many washes. I will definitely be hand washing this but there are some loose strings that I think may be an issue at some point, but that seems to be common with this kind of silky material. For the price, I’m pleased with it! Read more
items.author: Alissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Liked this dress a lot. Vibrant deep red color, good fit, comfortable. Dressy enough for the cocktail dress code event I went to - lots of compliments. Proportions worked well for me (5’1”) as I did want it just above the knee so I would recommend it for petites. I can see this being versatile and easy to wear under a blazer. I purchased it in another color as well. Read more
items.author: Comme La Lune

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dress
items.body: Pros: It’s very cute, flattering due to the little tie part in the front that hides the fupa, the dress doesn’t cling like some satin fabrics do. The asymmetric sleeves were my favorite part of the dress, I got a lot of compliments on this dress. Con’s: the bottom seam looks a little cheap when you really scrutinize the dress but you get what you pay for. Overall a good dress. Definitely needs a steam before wearing it. Fit true to size I am 5’8 around 185 and I ordered a large. Read more
items.author: Morgan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks expensive and feels it too!
items.body: Looks every luxury! The fabric steamed so well, it was super comfortable too. Perfect for hit weather because its very lightweight satin. I got a ton of compliments on it! Read more
items.author: 3 Gal Pals - Better Than Cold Pizza

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, but I was sent a worn dress
items.body: I loved this dress! I review the dress itself as a 5!! Ironed EASY and was so cute!! However, it came without a tag and smelled of cologne STRONG (?)… I think this was worn and then returned and whoever returned it marked it as new still… (hate when people do this!!). It also had a dot on it, small enough not to see from afar if you aren’t looking but it was there. I HAD to wear it to the wedding because I had it shipped to the destination and didn’t have time to buy or order a new dress. But I am sad it was $60 and it wasn’t “brand new” Read more
items.author: s.wight

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: This is my second time ordering this dress!! Really comfortable and classy for a wedding! The dress is short enough for cocktail hour but long enough for nice dinners/ receptions! Highly recommended! Read more
items.author: Not satisfied

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes buy it
items.body: Got complimented so much. Material is great, color is so pretty. Light weight perfect for summer wedding. Fits true to size. Wrap is very flattering Read more
items.author: Angela Rios

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!!
items.body: Love this dress! The fit is very flattering and the dress material itself is quite strong. I fell (heels are not my friend) and was shocked to see it held up. I downgraded to 4 stars because the very first time I put it on one of the buttons on the back popped right off. I didn’t have time to sew it back on but will before I wear it again. Extremely flattering if you’re a thicker girl (8 months pp here). I got lots of compliments!!! I ordered an XL, am 195lbs, 5’8. Color is navy (looks more like dark teal imo). Read more
items.author: Christina Maguire

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brilliant Green, Brilliant Blue, Blue, Deep Red, Grass Green, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Orange, Dark Brown, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
